title: Bug 13189 - Refactoring deleting fields context menu is overridden by message dialog
description:
On LinuxMotif and w2k:
1. Setup JUnit.

OB: No context menu is shown, instead, it asks me right away if I want to delete the getter/setter as well.
OB: No context menu is shown when right-clicking on 'fName' in TestCase.java's outliner. Instead, a message dialog prompts whether the getter/setter should also be deleted.
SR: Enable the option 'Code Generator - Remove prefix from field names'. Open TestCase.java and in the outliner, right-click on 'fName'.
